comments.body:
Please add a comment above the `license_file` line that reads:

```yaml
# License file manually packaged. See: https://github.com/saskakarsi/trict/pull/6
license_file: LICENSE
```

I've open a PR upstream (https://github.com/saskakarsi/trict/pull/6) to fix the issue of needing to manually package the license file. The comment is meant as a reminder to check for future updates whether the source distribution includes the license file. After it does, you can delete the manually packaged copy in the feedstock `recipe` directory.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@  license: MIT
  # License file manually packaged. See: https://github.com/saskakarsi/trict/pull/6
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
